Response Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

On the 29th of last month, I received the official letter and decree addressed to Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency Most Excellent Sir João Manuel de Lima e Silva, to which, with the same regret that now accompanies me, I found myself compelled to refuse such a request, which is so just for the security of the proclaimed system. I have goods, some of which I have already rendered, as Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency  
Fazenda do Salso, 1st of July, 1837.  
Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães

[On folio 1v. of document CV-212]
